p: The highest and lowest levels of nitric oxide (NO) radical scavenging percentage were 55.23% and 82.30% observed in the (NPKb) + U50% and control treatments, respectively. Nitric oxide (NO) radical scavenging was increased by 79.23%, 54.35%, and 51.10% when the plants were treated with (NPKb) + U50%, (Nb) + U50%, and (Pb) + U50%, respectively (Fig. 7a).
